item.description:
Hi Everyone
I have changed the time on Tuesday to 2pm at Panera Bread in Newington so it easier for more of us to go. I know many of us, our friends and family have been downsized and are looking for new ideas and leads to find jobs, let's get together and support each other
SO bring your ideas, your concerns and your successes with you on TUesday next week
I hope this is more convenient. See you there
Nancy soulpart@aol.com a 8:30am

group.name: The West Hartford Over 40 Fun Bunch!

item.name: a support meetup to discuss and brainstorm finding jobs
